content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li

content: Thank you for considering my apartment. I am looking for a fair and reasonable rental price. Can you propose a price that you believe is fair for a 25 square meter apartment in this area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Hello Baihu Li, it is my pleasure to meet you. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I believe a fair rental price for this apartment would be 700 euros per month. This is based on the market rate in this area and the condition of the apartment. What is your response to this price?
name: Baihu Li

content: Thank you for your proposal. I am willing to negotiate on the rental price. However, I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains as a landlord. Can you consider a higher price, perhaps in the range of 800-850 euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Hello Baihu Li, I apologize for not being able to meet your expectations. 700 euros per month is the best I can offer at this time. However, I am open to discussing other terms that may be advantageous for both of us. Would you be interested in discussing additional terms or negotiating the price further?

TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li

content: Thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to discuss additional terms. However, I am not interested in negotiating further on the rental price at this time. I believe 700 euros per month is a fair and reasonable price for this apartment. Thank you for your understanding. TERMINATE
name: Heinrich Heine
